title: 18: I'm Single for V-Day
description:
Sofia is convinced she is getting cheated on so this year, we will be celebrating GALENTINES Day. Seriously f*ck Valentines Day! I don’t want no Valentine I just want Valentino! This week, Sofia talks about her newfound feud with Howard Stern, teaches new hacks you can do to catch a cheater AND make money. Class is also back in session with a VERY controversial Sloot University lesson, followed by a step by step Slootorial on how you can have the BEST Galentines day with the girls. Love is in the air Sloots. Kind of. 

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/
